romantic.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
romantic.author: Aristotle

romantic.text: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
romantic.author: Maya Angelou

romantic.text: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
romantic.author: Roy Croft

romantic.text: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
romantic.author: Dr. Seuss

romantic.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
romantic.author: Audrey Hepburn

romantic.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
romantic.author: David Viscott

romantic.text: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
romantic.author: Franklin P. Jones

romantic.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
romantic.author: Lao Tzu

romantic.text: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
romantic.author: Victor Hugo

romantic.text: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
romantic.author: Nicholas Sparks

motivational.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivational.author: Sam Levenson

motivational.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
motivational.author: Dalai Lama

motivational.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
motivational.author: John Lennon
